videos.author: LegenVD
videos.title: Putting sagas into play for free!
videos.description:
Magic: The Gathering Arena gameplay with a five color saga deck, ft. Tom Bombadil as commander in Brawl. 

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LegenVD

00:00 - Intro
01:15 - Deck Tech
08:19 - vs Tatsunari, Toad Rider 
16:45 - vs Jhoira, Weatherlight Captain
20:31 - vs Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER
27:23 - vs Serah, Farron
31:15 - vs Tifa Lockhart
34:30 - vs Clive, Ifrit's Dominant
39:02 - vs Mendicant Core, Guidelight
43:03 - vs Choco, Seeker of Paradise
47:53 - vs Kotis, the Fangkeeper

Decklist:
